00053 
00054 #ifndef IPCP_H
00055 #define IPCP_H
00056 
00057 /*************************
00058 *** PUBLIC DEFINITIONS ***
00059 *************************/
00060 /*
00061  * Options.
00062  */
00063 #define CI_ADDRS        1                       /* IP Addresses */
00064 #define CI_COMPRESSTYPE 2               /* Compression Type */
00065 #define CI_ADDR         3
00066 
00067 #define CI_MS_WINS1     128                     /* Primary WINS value */
00068 #define CI_MS_DNS1      129                     /* Primary DNS value */
00069 #define CI_MS_WINS2     130                     /* Secondary WINS value */
00070 #define CI_MS_DNS2      131                     /* Secondary DNS value */
00071 
00072 #define IPCP_VJMODE_OLD 1               /* "old" mode (option # = 0x0037) */
00073 #define IPCP_VJMODE_RFC1172 2   /* "old-rfc"mode (option # = 0x002d) */
00074 #define IPCP_VJMODE_RFC1332 3   /* "new-rfc"mode (option # = 0x002d, */
00075                                 /*  maxslot and slot number compression) */
00076 
00077 #define IPCP_VJ_COMP 0x002d             /* current value for VJ compression option*/
00078 #define IPCP_VJ_COMP_OLD 0x0037 /* "old" (i.e, broken) value for VJ */
00079                                                                 /* compression option*/ 
00080 
00081 
00082 /************************
00083 *** PUBLIC DATA TYPES ***
00084 ************************/
00085 
00086 typedef struct ipcp_options {
00087     u_int neg_addr : 1;                 /* Negotiate IP Address? */
00088     u_int old_addrs : 1;                        /* Use old (IP-Addresses) option? */
00089     u_int req_addr : 1;                 /* Ask peer to send IP address? */
00090     u_int default_route : 1;            /* Assign default route through interface? */
00091     u_int proxy_arp : 1;                        /* Make proxy ARP entry for peer? */
00092     u_int neg_vj : 1;                           /* Van Jacobson Compression? */
00093     u_int old_vj : 1;                           /* use old (short) form of VJ option? */
00094     u_int accept_local : 1;             /* accept peer's value for ouraddr */
00095     u_int accept_remote : 1;            /* accept peer's value for hisaddr */
00096     u_int req_dns1 : 1;                 /* Ask peer to send primary DNS address? */
00097     u_int req_dns2 : 1;                 /* Ask peer to send secondary DNS address? */
00098     u_short vj_protocol;                /* protocol value to use in VJ option */
00099     u_char maxslotindex;                /* VJ slots - 1. */
00100     u_char cflag;                               /* VJ slot compression flag. */
00101     u32_t ouraddr, hisaddr;     /* Addresses in NETWORK BYTE ORDER */
00102     u32_t dnsaddr[2];           /* Primary and secondary MS DNS entries */
00103     u32_t winsaddr[2];          /* Primary and secondary MS WINS entries */
00104 } ipcp_options;
00105 
00106 
00107 /*****************************
00108 *** PUBLIC DATA STRUCTURES ***
00109 *****************************/
00110 
00111 extern fsm ipcp_fsm[];
00112 extern ipcp_options ipcp_wantoptions[];
00113 extern ipcp_options ipcp_gotoptions[];
00114 extern ipcp_options ipcp_allowoptions[];
00115 extern ipcp_options ipcp_hisoptions[];
00116 
00117 extern struct protent ipcp_protent;
00118 
00119 
00120 /***********************
00121 *** PUBLIC FUNCTIONS ***
00122 ***********************/
00123 
00124 
00125 #endif /* IPCP_H */
